summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that verify the functionality and numerical accuracy of the GPU‑accelerated signal processing utilities in the cupyx.scipy.signal package, covering B‑spline based FIR filtering, convolution/correlation method selection, 1‑D and 2‑D operations, median and Wiener filtering, and half‑precision data handling across diverse dimensions and edge cases.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the GPU‑based signal processing library for scientific and engineering applications, enabling reliable high‑performance computations and early detection of regressions in filtering and convolution algorithms.
